thread.title: 38 popular Android devices ship with malware already installed
thread.title_full: 38 popular Android devices ship with malware already installed

author: Mike Wehner
title: 38 popular Android devices ship with malware already installed
text:
Keeping malware off of your mobile device should be a top priority for anyone who purchases a new smartphone or tablet, but what if the battle against bad actors has been lost before you even open the box? That's exactly what security firm Check Point says is happening right now , and it just released a report claiming that it detected malware on 36 different Android devices being used by multiple large tech companies.
Continue reading...

The Galaxy S8 won’t be able to deal with the iPhone 8’s killer feature There’s a new Google Pixel in stores, but it’s not the Pixel 2 Despite imminent Galaxy S8 launch, now is the perfect time to buy a Galaxy S7
